Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ControllerGUI
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.view
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoardPlayer
    BoardPlayer class manages the scene of the game, along with the shelf, the chat, the board, all the goal cards and the shelves of the other players.
    ConnectionPlayer
    ConnectionPlayer class is the controller of the scene of the connection and login of the player
    EndGame
    EndGame class is the controller for the scene of the end of the game containing the scoreboard with the results
    ErrorMessage
    ErrorMessage class is used to create a pop-up message to show an error
    GenericController
    abstract class GenericController used to implement a simil-controller for the GUI to move from one scene to another
